Short Description: White Barn Whipped Coffee 3-Wick Scented Candle delivers an amazing, room-filling fragrance experience that smells like espresso, whipped sweet cream, caramel syrup and sugar crystals.
Long Description:
White Barn Whipped Coffee 3-Wick Scented Candle Benefits:

Why youll love our 3-wick candles:

  • Burns for approximately 25-45 hours
  • Infused with the good stuff (natural essential oils)
  • Our proprietary fragrance wax blend is formulated to provide the best fragrance experience
  • Quality lead-free wicks
  • Amazing quality from beginning to end
  • Comes with a decorative lid

Fragrance notes: Madagascar vanilla bean, homemade marshmallow, warm cinnamon and nutmeg.

How to Use:

Always trim wick to 1/4 inch before lighting and keep debris out of wax pool. Never burn longer than 4-hour intervals. Set candle on heat-resistant surface and avoid drafts. Always burn within sight and extinguish before leaving room. Dont burn near things that catch fire. Keep away from children and pets. Dont extinguish with water. Always let wax harden before relighting, touching or moving.

Shop White Barn Scented Candle today.

Use once a day, only at night. Apply 2-3 drops of the serum to clean dry skin, avoiding the eye area. Use product 2-3 times a week in the beginning and then increase to 5-7 days when skin is comfortable with Retinol. Allow serum to be absorbed in to the skin before applying your moisturizer.

Warnings:

Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Keep out of the reach of children.

Storage:

Keep in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

Brand Info: Magic presents SOFTSHEEN CARSON's superior hair care, hairstyling & hair color product offers for black men's natural, relaxed hair.

Long Description:
SoftSheen Carson Magic Extra Strength Cream Shave Benefits:

RAZORLESS CREAM SHAVE: The best way to get rid of razor bumps is to get rid of the razor! Our depilatory cream features a light fresh scent, works in 4 minutes and lasts for 4 days. Now with Shea Butter and Sweet Almond Oil.

FOR ALL BEARD AND FACIAL HAIR TYPES: Magic Razorless Cream Shave comes in 3 formulations: Regular Strength, Extra Strength, and Bald Head Maintenance, plus our classic powder formulation. No shaving with a razor! Easy to use at home.

SHAVING PRODUCTS: We make an array of products for all beard types & shaved heads, including razorless depilatory creams & powders to prevent razor bumps

FOR MENS GROOMING NEEDS: From shaving to hair color, pomade and hair moisturizer, find the products specifically formulated for black men that suit your grooming routine.

How to use:

SENSITIVITY TEST : Before using Magic Cream Shave for the first time, the following test must be performed. Wait at least 36 hours after using a razor or depilatory product before doing this test. Apply cream to a quarter size area of the beard Wait 4 minutes before removing. Do not scrape. Rinse area thoroughly. After 24 hours, if there is no sign of irritation or redness follow directions on product.

  • Wait 36 hours before using a razor or depilatory
  • Do not use after perspiring
  • Do not wash face before use
  • Do not use after prolonged exposure to the sun
  • Do not use any after shave product containing alcohol

Name: Mary Kay Clear Proof Pore-Purifying Serum 50g
Brand Info: MARY KAY  presents cleansers, serums, moisturizers & sunscreens that address acne, anti-aging, wrinkles & fine lines.
Short Description: Mary Kay Clear Proof Pore-Purifying Serum is a translucent, silky serum that helps control oil that may result in pimples for acne-prone skin.
Long Description:
Mary Kay Clear Proof Pore-Purifying Serum Benefits:

  • Powerful formula glides on smoothly.
  • Absorbs quickly.
  • When used as part of the Clear Proof System for Acne-Prone Skin, it may help minimize the appearance of pores and help control shine.

Mary Kay Clear Proof Pore-Purifying Serum is part of Clear Proof, a comprehensive skin care regimen dedicated to fighting acne. Several products in the system feature salicylic acid, an important ingredient in the fight against acne.

How to Use:

Step 1: Clarifying Cleanser for Acne-Prone Skin
This clear, lightweight cleanser quickly converts to a soft foam that helps remove excess oil and rinses clean with no residue. This formula contains two percent salicylic acid to keep surface dead skin from collecting in pores. This botanically enriched formula leaves skin feeling clean, refreshed and ready for the next step.

Step 2: Deep-Cleansing Charcoal Mask
Use up to 20 minutes at a time for two or three times a week. Wear as a full mask, or apply only to your T-zone. It contains activated charcoal and mineral clays to absorb pore-clogging impurities and excess oil, taking skin beyond everyday clean. As a result, your complexion looks clearer and healthier, and pores appear minimized.

Step 3: Pore-Purifying Serum for Acne-Prone Skin
This translucent, silky serum helps control oil that may result in pimples. The powerful formula glides on smoothly and absorbs quickly. When used as part of the Clear Proof System for Acne-Prone Skin, it may help minimize the appearance of pores and help control shine.

Step 4: Spot Solution for Acne-Prone Skin
This formula contains two percent salicylic acid to target blemishes and help reduce future breakouts by gently exfoliating the skin. This highly effective cream absorbs quickly and leaves no residue.

Step 5: If needed, follow with Clear Proof Oil-Free Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin or another Mary Kay moisturizer suitable for your skin.

Shop Mary Kay Serum today.

How to Apply Revlon Ultimate All-in-One Waterproof Mascara Black:

  • Curl your lashes with one of our expertly engineered eyelash curlers to help open up your eyes
  • Place the brush at the roots of your lashes and wiggle it, so you really darken and define things with the mascara formula, then draw it out to and pull through the tips
  • For more length and volume, add a second coat
  • For extreme length, hit the tips of your lashes with an extra stroke (the darker they get, the longer they look)
  • To define your bottom lashes, wipe excess mascara off the wand with a paper towel, then hold the brush tip vertically and swipe from side to side

Always let wax harden before relighting, touching or moving.

  • Do not apply to broken skin.
  • Avoid contact with fabrics and eyes.
  • If contact with eyes occurs rinse with clean water.

Name: Sun Basics SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion 89ml
Brand Info: SUN BASICS features specialized sun protection sunscreens, lotions and skin care products that prevent sun burns.
Short Description: Sun Basics SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion protects the skin from the harmful UVA / UVB rays & helps to prevent sunburns after swimming or outdoor activities.
Long Description:
Sun Basics SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion Key Benefits:

  • helps prevent sunburn
  • if used as directed with other sun protection measures (seeDirections), decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun
  • Water resistant for up to 80 minutes

How to Use:

  • apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure
  • reapply:
    • after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating
    • immediately after towel drying
    • at least every 2 hours

Active ingredients:

Avobenzone 3%,Homosalate 7.5%,Octisalate 5%,Octocrylene 5%.

Name: Revlon Volumazing Mascara Blackest Black
Brand Info: REVLON features lipstick, lip color, concealers, foundations, mascaras, powders & makeup products for face, eyes & lips.
Short Description: Revlon Volumazing Mascara Blackest Black is a volume-building mascara that delivers full, beautifully fanned-out lashes, in formulas that wont smudge or flake.
Long Description:
Revlon Volumazing Mascara Blackest Black Benefits:

  • Our Volumazing Mascara is the 2019 winner of Allures Best of Beauty Award for Best Beauty Steal. We took one look at this oversize brush and knew where things were headed, says Allure, thick, fluffy, fanned-out lashes.
  • Rich, inky color and incredible amplification of every last lash, with two formulas that wont smudge or flake
  • Quick buildable volume; lashes that appear longer; rich, intense color
  • The unique Turn It Up brush is designed with wavy bristles to tightly hug your lash curve as it deposits mascara
  • The waterproof option stands up to humidity and perspirationfor Volumazing lashes that last for up to 24 hours
  • Volumazing Mascara is available in 3 colors; Volumazing Waterproof Mascara is offered in 1

How to Use:

  • Curl your lashes with one of our expertly engineered eyelash curlers to help open up your eyes
  • Place the brush at the roots of your lashes and wiggle it, so you really darken and define things with the mascara formula, then draw it out to and pull through the tips
  • For more volume, add a second (or even third) coat
  • To define your bottom lashes, wipe excess mascara off the wand with a paper towel, then hold the brush tip vertically and swipe from side to side

Shop Revlon Mascara today.

Name: Vaseline Lip Therapy Original Lip Balm 20g

  • Vaseline Cocoa Butter Lip Therapy is made with pure Vaseline petroleum jelly for long-lasting moisturizing.
  • Clinically proven to help heal and prevent dry lips by locking in moisture.

Apply as needed to moisturize and soothe dry lips. Dip your finger into the tin and scoop out just enough to cover the tip. Spread across dry lips until absorbed as needed. Enjoy this powerful lip reliever as it locks in your lips natural moisture and relieves discomfort.

Name: Revlon Ultimate All-in-One Waterproof Mascara Blackened Brown
Brand Info: REVLON features lipstick, lip color, concealers, foundations, mascaras, powders & makeup products for face, eyes & lips.
Short Description: Revlon Ultimate All-in-One Waterproof Mascara Blackened Brown delivers a waterproof formula, so your lashes are always ready for what life throws your way.
Long Description:
Revlon Ultimate All-in-One Waterproof Mascara Blackened Brown Benefits:

  • Our new-and-improved 6-in-1 mascara formula does not disappoint: It darkens, volumizes, lengthens, defines, conditions, and lifts lashes!
  • And it does it all without smudging or flaking
  • The Revlon Power Mini Brush has a hollow core for depositing the perfect amount of mascara, and a clever oval shape with stiff bristles designed to grab every last lash
  • Now theres also a waterproof formula, so your lashes are always ready for what life throws your way

The Revlon Power Mini Brush is a unique mini oval shape designed to reach every lash and the hollow core is designed to deposit formula for mega lash impact.

How to Apply:

  • Curl your lashes with one of our expertly engineered eyelash curlers to help open up your eyes
  • Place the brush at the roots of your lashes and wiggle it, so you really darken and define things with the mascara formula, then draw it out to and pull through the tips
  • For more length and volume, add a second coat
  • For extreme length, hit the tips of your lashes with an extra stroke (the darker they get, the longer they look)
  • To define your bottom lashes, wipe excess mascara off the wand with a paper towel, then hold the brush tip vertically and swipe from side to side

Shop Revlon Mascara today.
